attributes.action: UK Government to begin FULL DISCLOSURE on UAP’s and Non-Human Intelligences.
attributes.additional_details:
Currently, in the United States of America, congressional hearings are taking place in which expert witnesses are testifying under oath under penalty of perjury that they have witnessed and have top secret information proving the existence of Unidentified Anomalous Phenomena (UAP's) & Non-Human Intelligences.

Given recent findings, we believe it is critical that the United Kingdom follow the United States' lead and stop the decades of silence on this crucial and pivotal period in our history.
attributes.background: We, the people of the United Kingdom, humbly request that the Government of the United Kingdom and the Sovereign, His Majesty King Charles 3rd, initiate a process of disclosing all facts relevant to the UFO/ET Phenomenon.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637661
Set up a UK investigatory office on UFOs/UAPs
